item.title: 硅谷興起「愛國主義風潮」
item.description:
華爾街日報説，硅谷投資界正在興起一股 「愛國主義風潮」。投資者對美國國防領域的資金投入激增。曾幫助 Facebook、Google 等科技公司起步的投資者們正轉向支持初創企業開發戰場軟件、軍用無人機和自動駕駛潛水艇等領域。這種轉變與中美關係近年來的明顯變化有關。風投人士正適應這種轉變。需要知道的是，硅谷投資者們並非單純因愛國而投資，而是因為這類投資能獲得豐厚回報。

According to The Wall Street Journal, there is a growing trend of 「patriotic investing」 in Silicon Valley’s investment community. Investors are significantly increasing their funding in the U.S. defense sector. Investors who previously supported tech companies like Facebook and Google are now shifting towards supporting startups developing battlefield software, military drones, and autonomous submarines. This shift is attributed to the noticeable changes in U.S.-China relations in recent years. Venture capitalists are adapting to this transformation. It is important to note that Silicon Valley investors are not solely driven by patriotism but rather by the potential for substantial returns on these types of investments.

item.title: Edge 瀏覽器修復了兩個安全漏洞
item.description:
微軟於剛剛過去的週末為 Microsoft Edge 124 發佈了安全更新（124.0.2478.97）。此次更新修復了兩個安全漏洞，分別是 CVE-2024-30055 和 CVE-2024-30055，前者允許遠程攻擊者通過特製的 HTML 頁面利用堆損壞，後者是 Microsoft Edge 獨有的低嚴重性欺騙漏洞。兩個漏洞均已被野外利用，因此 Edge 用户應儘快安裝更新。

Microsoft has recently released a security update (version 124.0.2478.97) for Microsoft Edge 124 over the past weekend. This update addresses two security vulnerabilities, namely CVE-2024-30055 and CVE-2024-30055. The first vulnerability allows remote attackers to exploit heap corruption using specially crafted HTML pages, while the second vulnerability is a unique low severity deception vulnerability specific to Microsoft Edge. Both vulnerabilities have been exploited in the wild, so it is recommended that Edge users install the update as soon as possible.

item.title: Edge 瀏覽器將獲得 AI 主題生成器
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，微軟打算為 Edge 瀏覽器推出一個基於 AI 的主題生成器。用户輸入文本提示詞，Edge 即可生成一系列圖像，並可設置為瀏覽器主題，包括圖像的主色調也可作用於瀏覽器框架。該功能計劃 6 月份發佈。組織管理員可使用 「AIGenThemesEnabled」 策略來限制 AI 主題生成功能。

Microsoft plans to introduce an AI-based theme generator for the Edge browser. Users can input text prompts, and Edge will generate a series of images that can be set as browser themes. The main color tones of the images can also be applied to the browser frame. This feature is scheduled for release in June. Organizational administrators can use the 「AIGenThemesEnabled」 policy to restrict the AI theme generation functionality.

item.title: HBO Max 承諾為老訂户保留 4K 和杜比權益
item.description:
軟餐獲悉，流媒體平台 HBO Max 表示，已擁有 4K 和杜比全景聲（Dolby Atmos）的 HBO Max 客户，在 6 月 11 日新計劃上線後也將被繼續保留這兩項權益。此前該公司曾表示 4K 和杜比全景聲（Dolby Atmos）僅包含在高級（premium）訂閲計劃中。HBO Max 本週早些時候宣佈了三項新的訂閲，將取代當前的訂閲。其中包括帶有廣告的基本計劃、支持 1080p 的標準訂閲以及支持 4K 和杜比全景聲的高級訂閲計劃。自 HBO Max 成立以來的訂户將自動轉到新的標準計劃，並將保留其 50% 的折扣。該公告引發了老訂户擔心權益 「縮水」 的擔憂，現在 HBO Max 不得不出來澄清，即新政策將僅適用於新訂户。

HBO Max, the streaming platform, has announced that customers who already have access to 4K and Dolby Atmos will continue to retain these benefits after the launch of their new plans on June 11th. Previously, the company had stated that 4K and Dolby Atmos were only included in the premium subscription plan. Earlier this week, HBO Max announced three new subscriptions that will replace the current ones. These include a basic plan with ads, a standard subscription supporting 1080p, and a premium subscription supporting 4K and Dolby Atmos. Subscribers since the inception of HBO Max will be automatically transitioned to the new standard plan and will retain their 50% discount. The announcement caused concerns among existing subscribers about a potential reduction in their benefits. HBO Max has now clarified that the new policy will only apply to new subscribers.

item.title: 谷歌雲誤刪了澳大利亞養老基金組織的賬户
item.description:
谷歌雲（Google Cloud）曝出事故——該公司上週不慎刪除了澳大利亞學術界養老基金 UniSuper 的賬户，導致該組織在 Google Cloud 上的所有數據都被擦除，數十萬客户無法訪問他們的財務數據。谷歌雲首席執行官託馬斯·庫裏安（Thomas Kurian）在聲明中寫道，UniSuper 的帳户發生的錯誤配置導致數據被刪除，且 Google Cloud 的兩個副本否被刪掉了。幸運的是該組織仍有另一個雲服務的備份，可通過該備份恢復數據。Google Cloud 稱這是一個獨特的事件，世界上任何地方的 Google Cloud 客户從未遇到過此類問題。

Google Cloud encountered an incident last week when it accidentally deleted the account of UniSuper, an Australian academic retirement fund, resulting in the erasure of all their data on Google Cloud. This incident left hundreds of thousands of customers unable to access their financial data. Thomas Kurian, the CEO of Google Cloud, stated in a statement that an error in the configuration of UniSuper’s account led to the deletion of the data, and two copies of the data on Google Cloud were also erased. Fortunately, the organization had a backup on another cloud service, allowing them to restore the data from that backup. Google Cloud referred to this incident as a unique event and stated that no Google Cloud customer anywhere else in the world has experienced such an issue before.
